TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFieldTemplateFactory

summary.span: 定义由创建字段模板的对象实现的接口。

span.span: Defines an interface implemented by objects that create field templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类必须实现为了创建字段模板的类。This class must be implemented by the class in order to create a field template. 此接口可提供初始化的方法并创建字段模板。This interface provides methods that initialize the and creates field templates.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate CreateFieldTemplate (System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn column, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode mode, string uiHint);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate CreateFieldTemplate(class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn column, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode mode, string uiHint) cil managed
Public Function CreateFieldTemplate (column As MetaColumn, mode As DataBoundControlMode, uiHint As String) As IFieldTemplate

public: System::Web::DynamicData::IFieldTemplate ^ CreateFieldTemplate(System::Web::DynamicData::MetaColumn ^ column, System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControlMode mode, System::String ^ uiHint);

param.name: column
param.span: 指定要用于显示字段模板的数据列。

span.span: Specifies the data column to use to display the field template.

param.name: mode
param.span: 指定字段模板的显示模式。

span.span: Specifies the display mode of the field template.

param.name: uiHint
param.span: 指定要使用的字段模板。

span.span: Specifies the field template to use.

summary.span: 使用 类、 类和 属性创建字段模板的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of a field template using the class, the class and property.

returns.span: 在类中实现时的 对象的实例。

span.span: An instance of a object when implemented in a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 动态数据字段模板是映射到数据模型中的数据类型的数据控件的 ASP.NET 用户控件。ASP.NET Dynamic Data field templates are ASP.NET user controls that map data controls to data types in a data model. 字段模板通常派生自，使用户可以访问数据字段、 数据列和数据模型中的元数据的类。Field templates generally derive from , the class that enables access to data fields, data columns, and metadata in data models. 动态数据项目提供默认字段模板，但你可以对其进行修改或创建自定义字段模板。Dynamic Data projects provide default field templates, but you can modify them or create custom field templates. 当实现此方法创建基于数据列，数据列的模式的字段模板和属性。When imlemented, this method creates a field template based on the data column, the mode of the data column, and the property. 你指定`uiHint`参数，如果你想要使用自定义的字段模板呈现数据。You specify the `uiHint` parameter if you want to render data using a custom field template.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize(class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel model) cil managed

param.name: model
param.span: 指定字段模板使用的数据模型。

span.span: Specifies the data model that the field template uses.

summary.span: 使用指定数据模型初始化 。

span.span: Initializes a using the specified data model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 动态数据使用字段模板来显示各数据字段。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses field templates to display individual data fields. 字段模板通常会为映射到数据控件中的各个字段的数据模型中的数据类型的用户控件实现。Field templates are typically implemented as user controls that map data types in a data model to individual fields in the data control. 此方法初始化将使用类，该类用于创建使用数据模型的字段模板的字段模板。This method initializes the class, which is used to create field templates using the data model the field template will use.
